short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easier photo and image viewing on Google Drive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You will be able to enlarge and enhance the clarity of image thumbnails in Google Drive for grid view. By displaying images optimized to fit your screen size while maintaining their original aspect ratio, it becomes easier to view the list of photos and images stored in Google Drive.

Key Features:

- Keep the aspect ratio of thumbnail images.
- Or crop images into squares.
- Display larger and clearer thumbnails compared to the standard.
- Fix the grid column size to any number between 1 and 6.

Privacy:

Does not send or store any information to external services.


The extension may stop working if the layout of Google Drive is updated. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to contact us at the support email address.
